players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Diana was killed last night. We need to find the mafia quickly before more townies are lost. I want to hear what everyone was doing last night."
Charlie: "Last night I stayed home and didn't talk to anyone. I think we should focus on who had the opportunity to kill Diana and why."
You: "Bob, I think you're trying to deceive us about your actions last night. As a detective, I need more information from everyone before we make any accusations."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice that we need more information before pointing fingers. Bob, can you clarify what you were doing last night, and Alice, have you investigated anyone yet?"
Bob: "Last night, I was at home as well, just like Charlie. Alice, if you're a detective, you should share some info to help us narrow down suspects instead of accusing without evidence."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
